product_name: The North Face Apex Bionic Jacket - Men's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: A great all-around coat for windy weather, The North Face Apex Bionic men's soft-shell jacket features windproof, water-resistant and breathable protection against the elements. Apex Bionic is a stretchy alternative to hard-shell outerwear and can be combined with fleece liners of various lofts to create highly thermal outerwear. Offering solid performance, Apex Bionic stretch laminated fleece is windproof, water resistant and breathable; fleece backer enhances moisture wicking and warmth. Durable Water Repellent finish fends off light rain showers and snow. Full-length windflap; chin guard; internal stretch cuffs; hem drawcord; Napoleon chest pocket; zippered hand pockets. The North Face Apex Bionic men's soft-shell jacket features a standard fit. Closeout.
short_description: A great all-around coat for windy weather, The North Face Apex Bionic men's soft-shell jacket features windproof, water-resistant and breathable protection against the elements.
